name: Yamil Alberto Peralta
bio:
Yamil Alberto Peralta, born on July 16, 1991, is a talented professional boxer who has made his mark in the cruiserweight division. Standing at an impressive height of 192cm, Peralta possesses a reach that matches his stature, making him a formidable opponent in the ring. With an orthodox stance, Peralta utilizes his height and reach advantage to deliver powerful blows and maintain control of the bout.

In the world of boxing, weight classes play a crucial role in determining the level of competition. Yamil Alberto Peralta is a force to be reckoned with in the cruiserweight division, where he demonstrates his skill, agility, and power. This weight class, with a maximum limit of 200 pounds (90.7 kilograms), showcases incredible talent and fierce competition.

Although Peralta has not earned any specific nicknames as of yet, his accomplishments in the ring speak for themselves. Throughout his career, he has displayed a remarkable level of determination, perseverance, and a hunger for victory. These qualities have allowed him to overcome challenges and make his way up the ranks in the boxing world.

As an experienced boxing writer with over 20 years of knowledge in the sport, I can confidently say that Peralta's technical skills and ability to adapt to different opponents are commendable. He possesses a deep understanding of boxing fundamentals, allowing him to counter his opponents effectively and exploit their weaknesses.

One of the key attributes that makes Peralta stand out is his ability to combine speed and power. Despite his towering height, Peralta showcases remarkable footwork that allows him to evade incoming attacks and swiftly move in to deliver powerful blows to his opponents. He has a lightning-fast jab and a devastating right cross, making him a dangerous adversary inside the ring.

Over the course of his career, Peralta has faced numerous opponents of varying skill levels. This has contributed to his development as a fighter, molding him into a well-rounded and versatile boxer. He has displayed exceptional defensive skills, effectively neutralizing his opponents' offense and minimizing the impact of their punches.

Peralta's boxing style can be best described as calculated aggression. He possesses the ability to analyze his opponent's strategy and capitalize on their mistakes, always looking for opportunities to exploit and secure a victory. His knockout power has ensured that he remains a formidable force in the ring, making him a thrilling fighter to watch.

Outside of the ring, Peralta carries himself with great humility and sportsmanship. He is a respected figure in the boxing community, known for his professionalism and dedication to his craft. Despite the physical nature of the sport, Peralta maintains a disciplined approach to training, ensuring that he is always prepared for his next challenge.

Looking ahead, Yamil Alberto Peralta has the potential to achieve great things in his boxing career. With his natural talent, unwavering determination, and incredible skills, he has already left a mark on the cruiserweight division. As he continues to face new opponents and overcome various challenges, the boxing world eagerly awaits his next move.

In conclusion, Yamil Alberto Peralta is a talented boxer who has proven himself in the cruiserweight division. With his impressive height, reach, and technical abilities, he has become a formidable opponent for anyone who steps foot in the ring with him. With his calculated aggression, knockout power, and commitment to his craft, Peralta is undoubtedly a rising star in the world of boxing.
